column2: I've been having these special feelings for a special someone lately. The strange urges to find myself embraced and close to another person. If I could only find myself alone with...

As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, diplomacy. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?

As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, the art of war. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?

As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, stewardship. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?

As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, intrigue. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?

As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in one of my experienced areas, learning. This is my chance to make an effort for the sake of [From.GetHerHis] education but what can I offer?

As [From.GetSheHe] is growing older, I can see that [From.GetFirstName] could use some guidance in some of my experienced areas. It will require hard work and may not always be appreciated but this is my chance to make a self-sacrifice for the sake of [From.GetFirstName].
I am practically an adult now, and people had better listen to me if they know what's good for them.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing strong tendencies towards prideful behavior.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards pride and has told me that I should show more ambition.
I find that it brings me great joy to bring joy to others.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing a kind disposition towards others.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] appreciates my kind disposition but thinks I could do even more to help others.
As I keep getting older, I find that humility comes naturally to me.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing a demeanor of natural humility.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I shouldn't try so hard to be humble but instead just be myself.
I like to climb, wrestle and run - and as I grow older I am beginning to notice that I am physically stronger than others.
Young [From.GetFirstName] loves physical games and is developing a strong physique.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sees that I am growing stronger but tries to encourage me to be more courageous.
I've read about the great [Root.GetMenWomen] in history, and someday I want to be like them.
[From.GetFirstName] is developing into an ambitious young [From.GetManWoman].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says that my ambition is good but [From.GetSheHe] thinks I should be more proud of what I have.
The more I think about it, the more I see that fairness and justice are things worth striving for.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to think a lot about justice, fairness and righting the many wrongs in the world.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should not speak so much of righting the wrongs of others.
I don't need many things - I can share what I have.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to always be willing to share.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I should talk more to people, give them more of myself.
I've always loved playing with others - and I still do!
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to have a natural charm and way with words.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] does not approve of my open and talkative nature and decided to beat it out of me.
I've always been one to finish my chores properly. And those of others.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is full of energy and a will to get things done.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should employ my considerable energies toward just causes.
I love it when everything is in good order, and I'm willing to spend the time that it takes.
Young [From.GetFirstName] loves keeping [From.GetHerHis] things in order and patiently spends lots of time on it.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my patient diligence but thinks I should be even more focused on the results of my efforts.
Thinking about things, I have concluded that everything in the world is not as the priests say it is.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to have a lot of independent opinions and refuses to listen to the priests.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should be less quick to question the words of the priests.
As I grow older, I increasingly find that my faith is a true fountain of strength.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be developing very strong religious sentiments.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to think that I should replace my reverence for [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] with love for my fellow man.
After weeks of waiting for the right opportunity I find myself behind the barn alone with the Farrier's apprentice that my heart has been longing for. My palms are sweaty and my chest is pounding.
I wake up in the middle of the night, my heart racing and my whole body is feeling strange. What was I really dreaming about?

Oh it's just something about [Root.GetHerHim] that I can't get off my mind. [Root.GetHerHisCap] hair, the way [Root.GetSheHe] moved. I'm getting all worked up just thinking about [Root.GetHerHim] again.
[lustful_target.GetHerHisCap] lips touching mine. My hands, touching [lustful_target.GetHerHim] gently. I wonder if [lustful_target.GetFirstName] feels the same way about me?
These kind of thoughts have been distracting me lately. I don't find them very interesting and they are disturbing my sleep.
[From.GetFirstName] has been looking at me in a new way lately. Giggling whenever I talk to [From.GetHerHim], laughing at things that are not meant to be funny.
Rules are for the weak. I know what I want.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing an arbitrary streak. It's showing more clearly every day.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards arbitrariness and has told me that I should show more ambition.
I get on well with others, while some people only chase ambitions and get into needless conflicts.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is very easily satisfied and obviously lacking in ambition.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] thinks I am being too passive and would like me to do more to help others in need.
I've always felt more comfortable being silent and letting others talk.
I have observed that young [From.GetFirstName] usually tries to stay out of the way of others.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I am too shy and should try to relax more and just be myself among people.
I like to play hard and talk straight. I have no time for nonsense.
Young [From.GetFirstName] plays hard and talks straight.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] appreciates my honest ways but tries to encourage me to be more courageous.
I know what I can do and have no reason to be afraid of anything.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is more and more becoming known for [From.GetHerHis] great bravery.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my bravery but thinks I should be more proud of my achievements.
The world is full of things that make me angry.
I have noticed that young [From.GetFirstName] seems to carry a lot of anger around.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should learn to better temper my anger.
There are so many things in the world that are just not worth expending energy on.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be showing more and more signs of laziness.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should get out more and talk to people.
I love fun and games, but the best game of all is the one of tricking people into doing things for me.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be developing a rather devious and manipulative streak.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] does not approve of my cleverness and cunning and decided to beat it out of me.
It's important to do things right, which includes not doing them too much.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is impressing everyone with [From.GetHerHis] sensible choices and great capacity for self-restraint.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] commends me on my temperance and wisdom and wishes that I employ it in the service of just causes.
I love keeping an eye on things, and I love counting them. Coins especially.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to love ordering and counting things, coins especially.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] approves of my active mind but thinks I spend too much time thinking about gold and silver.
There are people I know that follow different traditions than those of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. I have spoken to them and asked them about it, and now it doesn't seem so strange to me.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be taking a curious interest in other traditions than the [From.Religion.GetName] ones.
I love studying foreign customs, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should look to my own virtues instead.
The more I hear of the words of the wise [Root.GetMenWomen] of old, the more I want to be like them.
Young [From.GetFirstName] often speaks in reverence of the wise [From.GetMenWomen] of old, saying [From.GetSheHe] wants to be like them.
I worship the memory of the wise [From.GetMenWomen] of old, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that I should focus on loving the living around me instead.

After weeks of waiting for the right opportunity I find myself behind the barn alone together with the Carpenter's daughter that my heart has been longing for. My palms are sweaty and my chest is pounding.
I know my worth, and people had better not stand in my way.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing much petty cruelty towards others.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] disapproves of my tendencies towards cruelty and has told me that I should show more ambition.
I have learned that most people are kind, and it brings no benefit to walk with mistrust and suspicion.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to trust everyone, lacking any notion of the evil in man.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] would like me to be less naive and make more efforts to actually help others.
As I learn more about life, I find it is generally wise to stay out of danger as much as possible.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to constantly avoid taking any risks.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I am too fearful and should try to relax more and just be myself
Playing outside and scratching my knees has taught me to act quickly without unnecessary pause for thinking.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is showing tendencies to be more of a doer than a thinker. Yes, that would be a kind way to describe it...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says I need to put more thought into my actions, but without compromising my physical courage.
I've learned that if I put my mind to something I will usually get it.
Young [From.GetFirstName] is developing a stubborn streak.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should be proud of what I have but try to be less stubborn.
The more I think about it, the more I see how things are wrongfully denied me.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be envious of everything and everyone.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I should learn to temper my envy.
I find there is nothing that pleases me so much as just sitting down for hours, eating.
Young [From.GetFirstName] never stops eating, always staying longer than anyone at the table.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I spend too much time eating and should pause to converse once in a while.
Playing games and pranks is the best fun! I do think I never want to grow up.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to often react in erratic and strange ways in perfectly everyday situations. There is something not quite right there...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I am too 'strange' and decided to beat it out of me.
I know how things should be done, but I fear others are always trying to sabotage my efforts.
Young [From.GetFirstName] loves doing things [From.GetHerHis] own way, and often takes it personally and gets angry when others offer opinions.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] says it's good that I have my own strong ideas, but [From.GetSheHe] wants me to focus more on the results of my actions than on worrying about the envy of others.
I spend a lot of time exploring and thinking about how things work..
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be a real explorer and experimenter, constantly finding new ideas and topics that fascinate [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] seems to think I'm too clever for my own good, or so [From.GetSheHe] said.
It gives me great joy to admire the achievements of others. Especially as I am so weak myself.
Young [From.GetFirstName] seems to be quick to praise the deeds of others around [From.GetHerHim], while neglecting [From.GetHerHis] own physical activity and development.
I easily adore the virtues of others, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] thinks I'm too passive and should should focus more on helping people, lest I grow weak.
I shall bow to no one.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should show more ambition.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right - I am destined for greatness.
Kindness binds us all together.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should be more charitable.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should do more.
I should avoid the dangers of pride.
[From.GetSheHeCap] shouldn't try so hard.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should let go of it.
It feels good to be strong!
I should focus on teaching [From.GetHerHim] bravery.
Yes, I want to be brave like [From.GetHerHim]!
I will be the greatest.
I should teach [From.GetHerHim] to be more proud instead.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should be proud!
It's what separates us from the wild beasts.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should learn temperance.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should calm down.
It's not worth the effort accumulating things anyway.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should get out more and talk to people.
Very well, I'll make the effort!
And people seem to like me.
I shall beat it out of [From.GetHerHim]!
One day I'll do the same unto others.
I just like getting things done.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should use that power for good.
Sage advice.
One shouldn't rush things needlessly.
I should help guide [From.GetHerHim] in the right direction.
I should be more like [From.GetHerHim].
They are all liars!
I should try to stop these tendencies..
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right, I should calm down.
And I praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
[From.GetSheHeCap] should focus on helping others instead.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is right.
...the Farrier's apprentice.
...the Carpenter's daughter.
Declare my eternal love for her.
Declare my eternal love for him.
Honesty, if anything.
Show bravery to inspire others.
Treat all as equals.
Knowledge is power others don't need.
Knowledge is power, always learn more.
[From.GetSheHeCap] deserves greatness. Go get it!
That farmer [Root.GetBoyGirl] I met earlier.
What would it be like to hold [Root.GetHerHim]?
I will save myself for [lustful_target.GetHerHim].
I would do well to focus on other things.
It seems as [From.GetSheHe] is infatuated with me...
And I know where to get it.
It's fine, I don't need more competition.
[From.GetSheHeCap] can't tell me what to do!
I have what I need right here.
[From.GetSheHeCap] can only be [From.GetHerselfHimself].
I will try.
There is no need to be noisy.
All is as it should be.
I'm not trying, it's who I am.
I will always speak my mind.
[From.GetSheHeCap] should do [From.GetHerHis] own thing.
My strength is all I need.
What is there to fear? Nothing.
[From.GetSheHeCap] could never be like me anyway.
Good for [From.GetHerHim]!
But I don't have enough!
I can't stand it sometimes!
I should resist the temptation to intervene.
It would be wrong to not care!
It's true of almost everyhing, really.
Ah, the young will be as they are!
I'd rather give them my things.
I pull the strings.
I'm sure [From.GetSheHe] will suffer in life.
I'll speak of [From.GetHerHis] cruelty to everyone!
Self-control is the first step to greatness.
Life will reward [From.GetHerHim].
I already know what I want to do.
They are so shiny.
[From.GetSheHeCap] is a busy soul, just like me.
Now, don't be hasty, [From.GetLordLady] [From.GetFirstName].
We are all the same, I guess.
Boys will be boys.
But they are fools!
Only from knowledge comes true strength.
What a lovely child!
No, [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is the greatest!
...the Carpenter's daughter.
...the Farrier's apprentice.
Kiss her on the cheek.
Kiss him on the cheek.
Being sociable is key.
I'll have to toughen [From.GetHerHim] up...
Self-restraint, a life of moderation.
Others may try to trick you.
Don't be distracted by lust.
Be thorough, make others count on you.
[lustful_target.GetFirstName], kissing me.
[Root.GetSheHeCap] is the one for me.
[lustful_target.GetSheHeCap] gets me all excited.
Maybe it will change with time.
If they protest I will crush them.
Yes, [From.GetTitledFirstName]'.
Why would anyone want to harm me?
I help when I can, but rarely see a need.
Only the foolish take risks.
I'd rather be myself by myself.
Thinking was never my strong side anyway!
Honestly, I don't care.
I was just born stubborn.
I have nothing yet, but [Root.GetSheHe] who dares wins!
It should all be mine.
I don't care what that [GetRootFromInsult] thinks!
It is truly the ultimate good in life.
Why bother?
The world is made of pixie dust!
I'll let [From.GetHerHim] think it's working.
It's not wise to be overly zealous.
I must be wary of their envy.
But gold is so pretty!
It feels great to learn!
Girls will be girls.
Is [From.GetSheHe] not interested in the world at all?
They strike me with awe.
I shall love them when they have something interesting to say.
...no, I had better keep these thoughts for myself.
Suggest a secluded cuddle inside the barn.
Suggest a secluded cuddle inside the barn.
[From.GetFirstName] must learn on [From.GetHerHis] own.
Make your move at the right time.
Whatever it was is not important.
If I see [Root.GetHerHim] again we'll have some fun.
[From.GetSheHeCap]'ll be lucky if I don't poison [From.GetHerHis] food.
But the [Root.TopLiege.GetTitle] provides for all, surely?
There is nothing wrong with being cautious.
I don't even know what that means.
I'll decide for myself, thank you.
That's easy for [From.GetHerHim] to say!
I'd rather not talk with food in my mouth.
But I was invisible the whole time.
But they hate me!
Too clever for [From.GetHerHim], maybe.
I'm fine.
...no, these feelings are wrong!
I should just try to get to sleep.
I shouldn't. It's a sin.
